column4: hi, i'm running a kubuntu live usb stick; and i'm trying to mount an external hdd to backup my files but i don't know how, i've tried almost every /dev/sdXY with X from a to c and Y from nothing to 3
i think i don't see my external disk in the output of fdisk -l
if you look in /var/log/syslog you'll probably see the usb bus resetting
